data.name: 永夜之冬
data.detailed_description:
[introduction H2]
The game is a first person sandbox game. To place objects in it, you need to defeat all kinds of dark creatures to get them. Every time an object is placed in the scene, it will provide light source. When the light source reaches a certain number, it can turn the eternal night into day. In addition, in the chapter of the story, all kinds of weapons will continue to unlock with the increase of light sources.

game details
There are 16 melee weapons with different effects and 6 kinds of long-range bows and arrows in the game. You can choose 3 melee weapons and 6 kinds of long-range bows and arrows to switch and realize a variety of different attack modes! There are hundreds of phagocytic products produced by defeating dark creatures. And these phagocytes can be placed anywhere in the scene, and their angles can be changed. Put different effects of the game object in a reasonable position to achieve a variety of routines, build transmission array, recovery array... To help you more easily defeat the enemy. The game supports first person and God perspective to place objects.
There is a powerful scene editor in the game, which can change 3 primary colors of lights, and realize a variety of painting styles.
